My name is Ralph-Uwe Börner.\
I teach geophysics at the [Technische Universität Bergakademie Freiberg](http://tu-freiberg.de).\
My research interests are:

-   Theory of electromagnetic methods in geophysics
-   Potential theory and its applications in geophysics
-   Numerical simulation of Maxwell's equations
-   MATLAB and Julia
